    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        The number of layers in the neural network including the input and output.
        Returns:
        The total number of layers in the neural network.

      • getNumNeurons

        public int getNumNeurons()
        The number of neurons in the neural network.
        Returns:
        The total number of neurons in the neural network.

      • isVerbose

        public boolean isVerbose()
        See if the training function prints the result of each iteration.
        Returns:
        The verbosity of the training function.

      • predict

        public double[] predict(double[] input)
        Give a prediction based on some input.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to the neural network which is equal in size to the number of input neurons.
        Returns:
        The output of the neural network or an empty array if input size does not equal the length of the first layer.

      • train

        public double train(double[][] input,
                    double[][] output,
                    int epochs)
        Train the neural network to predict an output given some input.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to the neural network.
        output - The target output for the given input.
        epochs - The number of training cycles.
        Returns:
        The error of the network as an accumulated RMS.

      • train

        public double train(double[][] input,
                    double[][] output,
                    int epochs,
                    double acceptableError)
        Train the neural network to predict an output given some input.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to the neural network.
        output - The target output for the given input.
        epochs - The maximum number of training cycles.
        acceptableError - The amount of error at which to stop training.
        Returns:
        The error of the network as an accumulated RMS.

      • train

        public double train(double[][] input,
                    double[][] output)
        Train the neural network to predict an output given some input.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to the neural network.
        output - The target output for the given input.
        Returns:
        The error of the network as an accumulated RMS.

      • getWeights

        public double[][] getWeights()
        Get the current weights of the network's connections.
        Returns:
        The current weights of the network connections.

      • setWeights

        public void setWeights(double[][] weights)
        Sets the weights of the network's connections.
        Parameters:
        weights - The new weights of the network.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the neural network to a file (CSV).
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename in which to save the weights to.

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads a neural network from a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to retrieve the weights from.

      • classify

        public double[] classify(double[] input)
        Rounds the output of a Sigmoid output layer to the nearest whole number.
        Parameters:
        input - The input of the neural network.
        Returns:
        The output of the neural network with integer values.

      • test

        public double test(double[][] input,
                   double[][] output)
        Test the neural network on a testing set.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to the neural network.
        output - The target output for the given input.
        Returns:
        The error of the network as an accumulated RMS.
